User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the EduConnect Pro application. Could be a teacher or student.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user, typically the Firebase Auth UID.

role.description: The role of the user (tutor, student).

name.description: The full name of the user.

status.description: The verification status of the user (e.g., pending_verification, approved).

subjectCategory.description: For tutors, the main category of subjects they teach.

subjects.description: For tutors, a list of specific subjects they teach.

classLevels.description: For tutors, the class levels they teach.

experience.description: For tutors, their years of teaching experience.

experienceType.description: For tutors, the type of their teaching experience (e.g., School, Online).

address.description: For tutors, their address or city for location-based search.

coachingName.description: The name of the tutor's coaching center or institute.

whatsappNumber.description: The tutor's WhatsApp number for student communication.

Class.title: Class
Class.description: Represents a class created by a teacher.

teacherId.description: The ID of the teacher who created the class.

classCode.description: A unique, shareable code for students to join the class.

Enrollment.title: Enrollment
Enrollment.description: Represents a student's request to enroll in a specific class.

studentId.description: The ID of the student requesting to enroll.

classId.description: The ID of the class the student wants to join.

teacherId.description: The ID of the teacher who owns the class. Denormalized for security rules.

status.description: The status of the enrollment request.

ClassSchedule.title: Class Schedule
ClassSchedule.description: Represents a single scheduled class session by a teacher.

teacherId.description: The ID of the teacher who owns this schedule.

topic.description: The topic to be covered in the class.

date.description: The date and time of the scheduled class.

time.description: The time of the class session (e.g., '10:00 AM').

locationOrLink.description: The physical location or online meeting link for the class.

status.description: The current status of the scheduled class.

Performance.title: Performance
Performance.description: Represents a student's performance in a test.

StudyMaterial.title: Study Material
StudyMaterial.description: Represents a study material resource uploaded by a teacher or admin.

teacherId.description: The ID of the teacher who uploaded the material. Can be an admin ID.

classId.description: The ID of the class this material belongs to. Null if not class-specific.

teacherName.description: The name of the teacher who uploaded the material.

isFree.description: Whether the material is publically accessible.

isOfficial.description: Whether the material is official content from the platform.

/enrollments/{enrollmentId}.description: Stores student enrollment requests for specific classes.

/classSchedules/{scheduleId}.description: Stores individual class sessions scheduled by teachers.

/studyMaterials/{studyMaterialId}.description: Stores study materials uploaded by teachers or admins.
